mapper.sql: select t.menu_id, t.menu_name, t.menu_type, t.parent_id, t.order_num, t.page_path, t.icon_path, t.selected_icon_path, t.query_param, t.icon_type, t.icon_size, t.view_class, t.img_src, t.is_frame, t.menu_type, t.status, ifnull(t.perms,'') as perms, t.create_by, t.create_time, t.update_by, t.update_time, t.remark from sys_mobile_menu t
mapper.select: select distinct t.menu_id, t.menu_name, t.menu_type, t.parent_id, t.order_num, t.page_path, t.icon_path, t.selected_icon_path, t.query_param, t.icon_type, t.icon_size, t.view_class, t.img_src, t.is_frame, t.status, ifnull(t.perms,'') as perms, t.create_by, t.create_time, t.update_by, t.update_time, t.remark from sys_mobile_menu t where t.status = 0 order by t.parent_id, t.order_num

select distinct t.menu_id, t.menu_name, t.menu_type, t.parent_id, t.order_num, t.page_path, t.icon_path, t.selected_icon_path, t.query_param, t.icon_type, t.icon_size, t.view_class, t.img_src, t.is_frame, t.status, ifnull(t.perms,'') as perms, t.create_by, t.create_time, t.update_by, t.update_time, t.remark from sys_mobile_menu t left join sys_role_mobile_menu rm on t.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_role ro on ur.role_id = ro.role_id left join sys_user u on ur.user_id = u.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId} and t.status = 0 AND ro.status = '0' order by t.parent_id, t.order_num
select distinct m.perms from sys_mobile_menu m left join sys_role_mobile_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id

select distinct m.perms from sys_mobile_menu m left join sys_role_mobile_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where m.status = 0 and r.status = '0' and ur.user_id = #{userId}
select distinct m.perms from sys_mobile_menu m left join sys_role_mobile_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id where m.status = 0 and rm.role_id = #{roleId}
select count(1) from sys_mobile_menu where parent_id = #{menuId}
